channel.title: Byron Sharman's blog
channel.description: The latest blog posts from Byron Sharman

item.title: Blasterhacks 2024: My First Hackathon
item.description: I've been trying to find fun things to do more often in college, so when I heard my friends were signing up for a hackathon, I knew I had to try one. In the worst case, I'd lose a weekend, and either way, it certainly sounded more fun than sitting in my dorm all day. My teammates...
